data.title: Bee movie
data.text:
General Note:

Originally produced as a motion picture in 2007.

Animated.

Title and credits from container.

Widescreen 1.85:1.

Special features: Inside the hive : the cast of Bee movie; Tech of Bee movie featurette; Meet Barry B. Benson; We got the bee music video, Video jukebox, 5 featurettes for kids, and DVD-ROM features.

System Details Note:

DVD, region 1, NTSC, dual layer, widescreen; Dolby digital 5.1, 2.0 surround.

DVD-ROM system requirements: Microsoft Windows XP; Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 or higher; Adobe Acrobat Reader 5.0 or higher; Internet connection; DVD-ROM drive, software or hardware DVD player. Not available on Apple Macintosh.
